summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2065, for the improvement of 2nd Avenue South, by installation of a system of cluster lights, along the curb line of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation of said system; under Ordinance No. 20764 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
